prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey, just checking in! How's your day going?  
Reminder: Your appointment with Dr. Smith is tomorrow at 3 PM.  
Your delivery is out for delivery and should arrive by 5 PM.  
Just wanted to let you know the meeting is rescheduled to Friday at 10 AM.  
Can you send me the recipe for that pasta you made last week?  
Your OTP for account verification is 123456.  
We missed you at the family gathering! Let’s catch up soon.  
Please confirm your attendance for the workshop next week.  
Thanks for picking up my groceries! You’re a lifesaver.  
Your subscription to the newsletter has been confirmed.  
I’ll be late to dinner, got caught in traffic.  
Just wanted to remind you about the charity run this Saturday.  
Your bank statement is ready to view online.  
Would you like to join us for a movie night this weekend?  
Thanks for your patience! Your support ticket has been resolved.  
The kids are doing great! Can’t wait for you to see them.  
Let me know if you need anything while I’m out of town.  
Your package has been successfully delivered!  
Looking forward to our meeting next week. Please prepare the agenda.  
Happy Birthday! Hope you have an amazing day celebrating.  
You have a new message from your professor regarding your assignment.  
Let's plan a coffee catch-up soon. It’s been too long!  
Your payment of $50 has been processed successfully.  
The community center is hosting a free yoga class on Wednesday.  
I finished that book you lent me; it was fantastic!  
Just a heads up, the office will be closed for the holiday next Monday.  
Your password has been successfully changed.  
I can pick up the kids after school if that helps!  
Just a reminder that the deadline for submissions is next Friday.  
Thanks for your feedback! We appreciate your input.  
I’ll send you the documents by the end of the day.  
The weather looks perfect for our hike this weekend.  
Your appointment at the salon is confirmed for Saturday at 1 PM.  
I ran into Sarah today; she asked about you!  
Don’t forget to bring your ID for the event tomorrow.  
Your credit card statement is ready for review.  
Looking forward to our trip! Let’s finalize the itinerary.  
Just wanted to check if you’re still good for lunch tomorrow.  
I have your order ready for pickup whenever you’re free.  
Let’s reschedule our meeting to next week to allow more prep time.  
Thanks for your help with the project! It made a big difference.  
The fundraiser was a success! Thanks for your support.  
I’m here if you need to talk. How are you holding up?  
Your current balance is $200. Please let us know if you need assistance.  
I’ll be out of the office until next Tuesday.  
Congrats on your new job! Can’t wait to celebrate with you.  
Here’s the link to the webinar we discussed last week.  
Hope you’re feeling better! Let me know if you need anything.  
Your feedback is valuable to us; please take a moment to complete the survey.  
I’ll send you the invitation for the meeting shortly.  
Can’t wait to see you at the concert next month!  
Your feedback on the recent changes is appreciated.  
Thanks for your prompt reply! It helps us a lot.  
I’ll be available for a call anytime after 2 PM.  
The project deadline has been extended to next Friday.
